text:
MixRank | San Francisco, CA | Full-time Data Engineer

Big data, distributed systems, data science, and web crawlingâ€” a few of our favorite things!

We're a small team in the heart of SoMA, San Francisco that's really into data.

Work with us on big data problems in a small team environment. We're hiring full stack and data/systems engineers. MixRank is a perfect environment for anyone interested in web crawling, big data systems, analytics, data analysis/mining, machine learning, and data visualization. You can learn about all of these things the hard way: in the trenches with us, as we scale.
